author: Cleo Abram
description:
If an asteroid is coming for Earth… what would we really do?
Have a coffee with me! Try Cometeer with code CLEO for $20 off your Discovery Box on http://cometeer.com/cleo 

Imagine, it’s 2034, and a rock the size of a mountain, far off in our solar system is on a direct impact course for Earth. How would we know? And what would we actually DO about it?

In this video, we play out a fictional asteroid headed for Earth – with help from my friend and former NASA engineer Mark Rober and rare access into a remote facility where they discover NEW asteroids – to show you all the real science and tech we would use to defend our planet if an asteroid is about to hit Earth!

[SPOILER] Our rock was published in the Minor Planet Electronic Circular (MPEC) here! MPEC 2025-K125 : 2025 KS6 

Chapters: 
00:00 Did an asteroid hit Earth?   
01:00 What happens if an asteroid is headed towards Earth? 
01:52 Is that Mark Rober?   
03:26 How big was the asteroid that killed the dinosaurs?
04:30 What happen
title: Humanity’s Real Plan to Stop This Asteroid (Feat. Mark Rober)
